name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Essence_Transfer_F
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Essence Transfer F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. This enhancement gives many of your damaging powers a 18% chance to heal you for a moderate amount. Additionally, this enhancement reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Peacebringers and Warshades and may be slotted into any of their damage powers.
power_display_names: Superior Essence Transfer: Recharge/Global Heal Proc (Kheldian)
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Global Heal Proc
